name: Dice Battle BOX
description:
Dice Battle box is a simple arcade style wave shooter where in order to score points you need to collect Dice spawned across the map, that will also change your weapon.

there are currently only 2 enemies (Zombie, and Kamikaze) 

   

and 4 weapons (Pistol, Triplemachinegun, Machinegun and Shotgun)

I've planned to add more enemies and a few weapons but due to complications i was't able to do that, but after voting period ends i may expand this game a lil bit more.
